paper_title: Directed evolution of a beta-lactamase samples a wide variety of conformational states
method: Temperature-based plate screening of blaC variants
success_definition: blaC clones recovered after screening at 30C
notes: Approximately 5 x 10^5 clones were screened at each temperature; three blaC clones were found on the plate incubated at 30C.

paper_title: Reprogramming the SARS-CoV-1 Neutralizing Antibody S230 to SARS-CoV-2 via Directed Evolution and Molecular Docking-Based Binding Mode Analysis
method: Error-prone scFv library with bacterial display FACS
success_definition: Unique scFv clones with specific SARS-CoV-2 RBD binding in final round
notes: Library consisted of over 1 x 10^8 unique clones; six unique scFv clones (IJ7, IJ18, IJ28, IJ29, IJ36, IJ43) were identified with specific binding in the final round.

paper_title: Synergistic engineering PETase reveals loop-region mutations for enhanced catalytic activity and thermal stability
design_task: PETase activity and thermal stability improvement (DepoPETase)
success_definition: DepoPETase variant obtained after three rounds of directed evolution
notes: Reported in this paper citing ref 30: screened over 10,000 clones through three rounds of directed evolution to develop DepoPETase.
